tool.name: colabfold_alphafold
tool.description: This tool runs the alphafold step of the collabfold tool in Galaxy
tool.command: ln -s $input input.tar && mkdir input_data && tar -xmf input.tar --strip-components 1 -C input_data && mkdir output && colabfold_batch #if $num_recycles.set_num_recycles == "manual" --num-recycle $num_recycles.num_recycles #end if #if $recycle_tolerance.set_early_stop == "manual": --recycle-early-stop-tolerance $recycle_tolerance.recycle_early_stop_tolerance #end if #if $num_ensemble: --num-ensemble $num_ensemble #end if #if $random_seed: --random-seed $random_seed #end if #if $num_seeds: --num-seeds $num_seeds #end if #if $num_models: --num-models $num_models #end if $use_dropout #if $max_msa: --max-msa $max_msa #end if #if $amber.use_amber == "yes": --amber --num-relax $amber.num_relaxed #end if $output_options.save_all $output_options.save_recycles $output_options.save_single_representations $output_options.save_pair_representations ## --data \${ALPHAFOLD_DB} input_data output

param.name: input
param.label: zip file output from colabfold msa tool

param.name: set_num_recycles
param.label: Set number of recycles
param.help: If auto selected, will set to 20, assuming selected model type is alphafold2_multimer_v3. If not will set to 3.

param.name: set_early_stop
param.label: Set early set tolerance
param.help: if auto selected, will set tolerance to 0.5, assuming the selected model is alphafold2_multimer_v3 otherwise, tolderance is set to 0.0.
Specify convergence criteria. Run recycles until the distance between recycles is within the given tolerance value.

param.label: Number of ensembles
param.help: Number of ensembles. The trunk of the network is run multiple times with different random choices for the MSA cluster centers. This can result in a better prediction at the cost of longer runtime.

param.label: Number of seeds
param.help: Number of seeds to try iterated based on random seed

param.label: Number of models to use for structure prediction
param.help: Reducing the number of models speeds up the prediction but results in lower quality

param.name: max_msa
param.label: Max msa
param.help: Enable dropouts and increase number of seeds to sample predictions from uncertainty of the model. Decrease to increase uncertainity

param.label: Use dropouts
param.help: Activate dropouts during inference to sample from uncertainity of the models.

param.name: num_relaxed
param.label: How many top ranked structres to relax using Amber
Save raw outputs from model to a pickle file
Save all intermediate predictions at each recycle iteration
Save the single representation embeddings of all models.
Save the pair representation embeddings of all models.

tool.help: Generate run a folding step on the output of the colabfold msa run
